en.title: {{The Complete Flutter & Dart Development Course}}
en.text: Completed comprehensive Flutter and Dart development course covering fundamental concepts, widget development, state management, and building cross-platform mobile applications.

es.title: {{The Complete Flutter & Dart Development Course}}
es.text: Completé un curso completo de desarrollo Flutter y Dart que cubre conceptos fundamentales, desarrollo de widgets, gestión de estado y construcción de aplicaciones móviles multiplataforma.

fr.title: {{The Complete Flutter & Dart Development Course}}
fr.text: Terminé un cours complet de développement Flutter et Dart couvrant les concepts fondamentaux, le développement de widgets, la gestion d'état et la création d'applications mobiles multiplateformes.

ko.title: {{The Complete Flutter & Dart Development Course}}
ko.text: 기본 개념, 위젯 개발, 상태 관리 및 크로스 플랫폼 모바일 애플리케이션 구축을 다루는 포괄적인 Flutter 및 Dart 개발 과정을 완료했습니다.

en.title: {{Flutter Advanced Course Bloc and MVVM Pattern}}
en.text: Advanced Flutter course focusing on BLoC (Business Logic Component) pattern and MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) architecture for building scalable and maintainable Flutter applications.

es.title: {{Flutter Advanced Course Bloc and MVVM Pattern}}
es.text: Curso avanzado de Flutter centrado en el patrón BLoC (Business Logic Component) y la arquitectura MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) para construir aplicaciones Flutter escalables y mantenibles.

fr.title: {{Flutter Advanced Course Bloc and MVVM Pattern}}
fr.text: Cours Flutter avancé axé sur le modèle BLoC (Business Logic Component) et l'architecture MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) pour créer des applications Flutter évolutives et maintenables.

ko.title: {{Flutter Advanced Course Bloc and MVVM Pattern}}
ko.text: 확장 가능하고 유지 관리 가능한 Flutter 애플리케이션을 구축하기 위한 BLoC(Business Logic Component) 패턴 및 MVVM(Model-View-ViewModel) 아키텍처에 중점을 둔 고급 Flutter 과정.

en.title: {{Deep Dive into Clean Architecture in Flutter}}
en.text: In-depth course on implementing Clean Architecture principles in Flutter applications, covering dependency injection, separation of concerns, and testable code structure.

es.title: {{Deep Dive into Clean Architecture in Flutter}}
es.text: Curso en profundidad sobre la implementación de principios de Arquitectura Limpia en aplicaciones Flutter, cubriendo inyección de dependencias, separación de responsabilidades y estructura de código testeable.

fr.title: {{Deep Dive into Clean Architecture in Flutter}}
fr.text: Cours approfondi sur l'implémentation des principes de Clean Architecture dans les applications Flutter, couvrant l'injection de dépendances, la séparation des préoccupations et la structure de code testable.

ko.title: {{Deep Dive into Clean Architecture in Flutter}}
ko.text: 의존성 주입, 관심사 분리 및 테스트 가능한 코드 구조를 다루는 Flutter 애플리케이션에서 Clean Architecture 원칙 구현에 대한 심층 과정.

en.title: {{Flutter Payment Integration: Stripe, PayPal & More!}}
en.text: Comprehensive course on integrating payment gateways in Flutter applications, including Stripe, PayPal, and other payment providers for secure and seamless transaction processing.

es.title: {{Flutter Payment Integration: Stripe, PayPal & More!}}
es.text: Curso completo sobre la integración de pasarelas de pago en aplicaciones Flutter, incluyendo Stripe, PayPal y otros proveedores de pago para un procesamiento de transacciones seguro y sin problemas.

fr.title: {{Flutter Payment Integration: Stripe, PayPal & More!}}
fr.text: Cours complet sur l'intégration de passerelles de paiement dans les applications Flutter, incluant Stripe, PayPal et d'autres fournisseurs de paiement pour un traitement de transactions sécurisé et transparent.

ko.title: {{Flutter Payment Integration: Stripe, PayPal & More!}}
ko.text: 안전하고 원활한 거래 처리를 위해 Stripe, PayPal 및 기타 결제 제공업체를 포함하여 Flutter 애플리케이션에 결제 게이트웨이를 통합하는 포괄적인 과정.
